marklogic.body: Given that Wells is slated to pitch again Sunday, and that Samardzija could potentially go again Monday, there's really no reason to decide the 5th starter until after both of their next outings.Â They could go ahead and name Volstad and hold Off naming the last Spot until say next Tuesday.Â The one thing that these decissions could change is how many of the last 3 viable candidates for a starting slot will make the 25-man roster.Â I can't see Lopez and Wells both in the bullpen if Samardzija is chosen, but I can see them all on the 25-man roster if someone other than Samardzija is chosen since Samardzija could go to the pen in short relief and either Wells or Lopez going down as the long relief man.
